TopicTitle: Do you launch from the VAB/SPH or Launchpad/Runway?

Articles.Content:
Vote in the poll.

 

I personally launch from the VAB/SPH only. 2 reasons:

1. Kerbal Konstructs only works in the VAB/SPH if I want to launch from somewhere else

2. My old KASA save was really buggy, so I could only launch from the VAB/SPH. It's not in my new save anymore, but you know, habit.

If I just want to launch something I’ve already built, as is, I launch from the pad or runway (and I can select the launch site from that menu too including KK and DLC sites). Otherwise, I open the menu in the pad/runway and find the craft but then start editing it and then launch from the VAB/hangar once I’m done editing it.

If I’m building from scratch I go straight to the VAB/hangar. Those instances become increasingly rare as I progress through a play through and eventually all I need to do is build the probe/rover/whatever without bothering about a launch rocket and then use KSTS to put it in orbit using a pre-recorded launch which is more precise and less of a faff than doing a proper launch each time.

1 minute ago, jimmymcgoochie said:

If I just want to launch something I’ve already built, as is, I launch from the pad or runway (and I can select the launch site from that menu too including KK and DLC sites). Otherwise, I open the menu in the pad/runway and find the craft but then start editing it and then launch from the VAB/hangar once I’m done editing it.

If I’m building from scratch I go straight to the VAB/hangar. Those instances become increasingly rare as I progress through a play through and eventually all I need to do is build the probe/rover/whatever without bothering about a launch rocket and then use KSTS to put it in orbit using a pre-recorded launch which is more precise and less of a faff than doing a proper launch each time.

Ah, ok. Instead, I build the payload, then merge it with a prebuilt launcher and let mechjeb do it. Another reason I launch from the VAB/SPH is because last minute changes, and stuff. But yeah, I understand your thinking.

I only launch from sph and vab. I do use woomerang and dessert site occasionally. I really want to start using orbital construction, ground construction and kerbal konstructs but am not sure on how to use them....

Edited February 16, 2021 by Lewie
I launch from the launchpad, and take off from the runway.

8 minutes ago, Gargamel said:

I launch from the launchpad, and take off from the runway. 

Well, I'm sure everyone has taken off from the launchpad and launched from the runway at least once
